_header: Jesu God Son Lord of magesty / Send will to my heart only to covet Thee
Note: This poem is inserted into a Southern version of Incendium Amoris, 3275, at line 68; 6540.5, one quatrain, is incorporated into this piece. See also 2284, 5940.
Title(s): A Song of Love-longing to Jesus
_description: A Song of Love-longing to Jesus — twelve monorhyming quatrains with occasional medial rime

CULDd564.First Lines:
[I]Hesu god son lord of magestesend wil to my hert anly to couayte
                    þe…
CULDd564.Last Lines:
…On hym þat þe boght hafe al þi thought & lede
                    þe in his lareGyf al þi hert til crist þi qwert & lufe
                    hym euer mare
